body:
> See also discussion in #16845. Is there a manual for checking performance (can't imagine this affects performance, though)?

This is in a critical path for lots of things. This absolutely needs checking.

http://pandas.pydata.org/pandas-docs/stable/contributing.html#running-the-performance-test-suite

Alright, I've run asv. It took 2 hours, and the results are all over the place, from ratios of over 3 down to 0.01.  I assume this is not normal.

I tried selectively running the worst offenders individually, and then the results were now within limits (``BENCHMARKS NOT SIGNIFICANTLY CHANGED``). Do I need to take special precautions when running the whole suite, to avoid affecting the results?
ok on the asv. thanks for running that. just needs a whatsnew note. ping on green.
